name: BTrain One-FOr-All Jam
description:
This is an SRPG Studio project for the One-For-All Gamejam. 

I had a lot of fun working on this game. A lot of the assets used are from my main project, Grey Heritage: Faded Vision. The art and music are used from there to save time. The writing was something I came up with a while ago. The surprisingly part is that it was one of my first script for Grey Heritage until it got scrapped for my current plot. 

I plan to come back to this game in the future when I can polish this story so it can be ready for a commercial release. Until then, here is a fun and quick teaser on what I will work on in the future.
